name: Gia Ford
description: '''Molly Emma Elizabeth McCormick''' (born 28 November 1996), known professionally as '''Gia Ford''', is an English singer-songwriter. She began her career under [[Dirty Hit]] with the mixtapes/EPs ''Poster Boy'' (2019) and ''Murder in the Dark'' (2020). After signing to [[Chrysalis Records]], she released her debut album ''Transparent Things'' (2024).
